channel.title: Prince dead . game over
channel.description:
it's usually the case that if the Prince gets ring killed in the first few turns that 22nd will go onto lose . Unseen have protection against this with step up a season to mm .
Maybe if Prince dies in first 3 turns a random noble could take over his role . would also reduce the likelihood of Sir Gamedropper of the boring class .

item.title: Prince dead . game over
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Then they need to actually try and nor sit around all day.
